keyword: calories in one tablespoon of peanut butter
title: Calories in One Tablespoon of Peanut Butter
meta_description: Discover calories in one tablespoon of peanut butter, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in One Tablespoon of Peanut Butter
assumptions: Smooth, natural peanut butter; no added sugar, salt, or oils; standard serving ~16 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, ingredients (e.g., added sugar/oil), texture, and measurement. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One tablespoon of peanut butter provides ~94 kcal and ~4 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one tablespoon of peanut butter?
faqs.a: About 94 kcal for natural smooth peanut butter.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a tablespoon of peanut butter?
Does peanut butter have a lot of fat?
faqs.a: Yes, ~8.2 g total fat per tablespoon, mostly healthy unsaturated fats.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in peanut butter?
faqs.a: Around 73 mg per tablespoon for natural varieties; higher in salted brands.

faqs.q: Is peanut butter keto-friendly per tablespoon?
faqs.a: Yes, low carbs (~3.1 g) and high fat make it suitable in moderation.
